name: injectbook
description: Convert EPUB books into Codex-compatible agent skills

scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json && node scripts/copy-assets.cjs && chmod +x dist/src/cli.js
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && node --test dist/test/parser.test.js dist/test/skill-writer.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
